job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description:
Site Reliability Engineer / Sr DevOps Engineer
Location – Seattle, WA – Remote OK
Duration – 12 months
Required:
• Bachelor's degree in CS or a related STEM engineering field strongly preferred
• Relevant certifications are a plus
• 8-10+ years of Site Reliability / DevOps Engineering
• Expertise in AWS / Azure
• Expertise in Kubernetes, kOps, & Helm 3.
• Istio service mesh experience is strongly preferred.
• •Experience with Infrastructure as Code IIAC) required.
• Specifically we are looking for Terraform
• Fluency in at least one language required: Python, C#, JAVA. Should have strong API experience.
• Experience working in SOA and 12 factor app methodology
• Strong leadership, initiative taking, and capacity for decision making
• Expert knowledge in any or all of these is a huge plus: Prometheus Operator, Grafana, Loki, ELK Stack, OpenTelemetry, Jaeger/OpenTracing
• Participate in the on-call rotation

What You'll Do
• Work across teams to completely automate everything we do
• Drive and own best practices with automation, be passionate and proactive
• Approach alerting, monitoring, and log aggregation with an eye toward flexibility and insight-driven metrics
• Collaborate with the teams to ensure ongoing infrastructure management/automation (IAC), CI/CD pipeline construction in collaboration with the Release Engineering team, monitoring, and maintenance
• Enable our engineering teams to deliver high quality software, fast, well tested, in a highly repeatable way
• Create automated tool sets to deploy, measure, solidify and observe our infrastructure
• Ongoing study and implementation of the industry's latest best practices and drive those within the company
• Participate in the on-call rotation
